name: Dimension
summary: A simple object consisting of the position and size measurements. Effectively combines Size and Point but ensures numeric x/y values.

properties.name: x
properties.summary: The x-axis coordinate of the position. When returned by rect the position is relative to it's parent.

properties.name: y
properties.summary: The y-axis coordinate of the position. When returned by rect the position is relative to it's parent.
